titles.title: Stand By Your Ad Act of 2010

To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to require certain campaign-related communications which are paid for by certain tax-exempt organizations or political organizations to include a statement naming their five largest donors, and for other purposes.
Stand By Your Ad Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary:
Stand By Your Ad Act of 2010 - Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to require certain campaign-related communications which are paid for by certain tax-exempt organizations or political organizations to include a statement naming their five largest donors.
Requires organizations to include information on their largest donors in reports on independent expenditures and electioneering communications.
